column5: Well, the opener was slow for me, but great for my friends...no worries... I needed the break from the everyday grind.  I caught this fish in a small trib off Lake Huron Saturday morning and there is some debate as to what the fish is.   It is either a large brook trout( for these waters) or a small brown trout?  What do you all think ?  Thanks  Splashhopper
No poll needed, it's a brown trout.
Brown... here's a spec/brook to compare it to. Specs have square tails.. and reddish bellies.
